description:
Yurika and Inez put together a "Get to Know the Nadesico" broadcast to explain the crew`s recent expedition on Mars. Meanwhile the crew’s thoughts turn towards attempting to repair their badly damaged ship enough to depart Mars. Meanwhile, Akito discovers that it was Admiral Fukube’s fault the Jovian chulip destroyed his Martian home.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "The Song" That You Will One Day Sing
